animeTitle: Sudden Wealth System: I Have 999 New Identities
otherNames: 暴富系统：我有999个新马甲, Sudden Wealth System: I Have 999 New Identities, Get rich system: I have 999 new vests
synopsis: Lin Yi, a post-2000s young man, was oppressed by his unscrupulous boss and angrily ‘fired’ his leader. At a loss for what to do next, he accidentally activated the ‘Sudden Wealth System,’ which allowed him to experience countless professions and reap generous rewards. He found great satisfaction in shaking up the workplace and continued to enjoy the thrill of reforming it. With the system’s assistance, Lin Yi won the heart of a beautiful woman, built his own business empire, and became a wise and wealthy successful person, ultimately reaching the pinnacle of life!
